creator: alex.scotti@tiscalinet.it
text:
HttpSessionBindingEvent.getValue() fired by a 
HttpSessionBindingListener.valueUnbound() returns null even if I know it was 
not a null value.

Regards
Alessandro Scotti

This works for me with the latest version of TC4.

If you still experience this problem please reopen this bug. As this works for 
me, if you do need to reopen this bug, a simple test case will be required to 
enable the root cause of the problem to be identified.
creator: medthomas@ntlworld.com
